  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, ReferenceHeadMountable, Identifiable, Named, Solutions.Subject, Camera, HeadMountable, Locatable, Movable, MovableMountable, PropertySheetHolder, WizardConfigurable

    public class OpenCvCamera
extends ReferenceCamera
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A Camera implementation based on the OpenCV FrameGrabbers.
